item.title: The PSN January Sale is now on with big savings
item.content:encoded:
As tradition, the PSN January Sale has kicked off before Christmas so it can tempt you to spend those PSN Gift cards straight away.  Also as tradition, the savings depend on where you are in the world so there’s no easy way to collate them all but hopefully this should give you an idea of what’s on offer.

The final tradition is that the banner adverts on the store lie, you can actually save up to 90%, not 75%.

There are some really good offers this time, especially if you are picking up older games. Control: Ultimate Edition is cheaper than a pint and under £6 so if you have not played that, then you really should grab it, and I can also recommend Still Wakes The Deep: The Complete Edition, which is a few pennies over £13. You are also completely mad if you don’t pick up Limbo AND Inside for £2.19.

A word of warning, the store is still packed full of rubbish shovelware, but if you really want to jack up your Platinum trophy count then Beanball is on sale for seven pence – yes, 7p – and you can get the Plat in 5 mins.

More recent games with savings include Silent Hill f, Battlefield 6, and ARC Raiders. I think I am going to grab Dispatch.

Here are our top picks from the UK Store.

  • Forza Horizon 5 Standard Edition -40% – £32.99
  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 -20% – £35.99
  • Dispatch -10% – £26.09

  • Battlefield 6 –30% – £48.99

  • Death Stranding 2: On The Beach -25% – £52.49
  • Silent Hill f -40% – £41.99
  • Senua’s Saga: Hellblade II -40% – £29.99
  • ARC Raiders -20%  – £26.39
  • Assassin’s Creed Shadows -50% – £34.99
  • The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion -33% – £33.49
  • The Outer Worlds 2 -30% – £41.99
  • Hell Is Us -40% – £29.99
  • Dying Light: The Beast -20% – £46.39
  • Indiana Jones and the Great Circle  -30% – £48.99
  • Gears of War: Reloaded -50% -£19.99
  • Hollow Knight: Silksong -20% – £12.79
  • Cyberpunk 2077 -55% – £17.99
  • No Man’s Sky -60% – £15.99
  • Assassin’s Creed Mirage – Master Assassin Edition -70% – £22.49
  • A Way Out -83% – £4.49
  • Control: Ultimate Edition -85% £5.24
  • Still Wakes The Deep The Complete Edition -60% – £13.19
  • Dead Space (PS5) -85% – £10.49
  • Devil May Cry HD Collection & 4SE Bundle -67% – £13.19
  • Disco Elysium – The Final Cut -75% – £8.24
  • Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice – Game of the Year Edition -50% – £29.99
  • Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii -60% – £21.99
  • DOOM: The Dark Ages Premium Edition -50% – £49.99
  • LIMBO & INSIDE Bundle -90% – £2.19

  • Spirit of the North 2 -40% – £14.99

Source: PSN Store
